name: stracer
short_description:
"stracer" is my implementation of a simple system call tracer inspired from a project called strace+ from google-code. It peeks the registers and shows the arguments for the system calls which I used for implementing a prototype on data flow anomaly detection in elf-binaries. More info on the paper can be found here:  http://seclab.cs.sunysb.edu/seclab/pubs/ieee06.pdf
Currently it supports very few system calls. Planning on adding more system call support and dynamically changing the parameters for on-the-fly debugging
summary: A very basic cli tool for system call tracing.
